Jira_getJiraKey.name: Jira_getJiraKey
Jira_getJiraKey.description: Gets the key of a JIRA issue

Jira_getJiraDetails.name: Jira_getJiraDetails
Jira_getJiraDetails.description: Gets the details of a JIRA issue (title, description, comments, attachments)

Jira_createIssue.name: Jira_createIssue

parameters.name: projectKey
parameters.description: The Jira project key (usually a short capitalized code)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The issue description in Markdown format

parameters.name: reporterEmail
parameters.description: The email address of the user who be assigned as the reporter for this issue.

parameters.name: relatedContentForIssueTypeDetection
parameters.description: User content (chat messages etc) which could assist with the issue type detection

Jira_createIssue.returns: >} The created issue key and URL

Jira_postComment.name: Jira_postComment
Jira_postComment.description: Posts a comment to an existing JIRA issue
Jira_postComment.returns: The ID of the created comment

Jira_updateJiraDescription.name: Jira_updateJiraDescription
Jira_updateJiraDescription.description: Updates the description of an existing JIRA issue

parameters.name: issueId
parameters.description: The issue ID or key (e.g., ABC-123)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description in Markdown format
